lessie.verification: Kyle Matson was successfully verified as the Head of Corporate Development at Robinhood. Multiple sources, including The Org, Clay, and Foundersuite, confirm his current role at Robinhood (where he has been since 2017, previously serving as Chief of Staff to the CEO). His professional background includes experience at Ribbit Capital, Square, and Bain & Company, and he is based in San Francisco.
